name: Phlobb's Adventure Demo
description:
A time traveling demon plots to take over the world by controlling the sacred continent Provenance, the home of the four elements, and only Phlobb can stop him. Just a simple platformer styled after Kirby and Mega Man, call it "Jump 'n' Shoot 'n' Float Man."

Controls:

  • Arrow keys - Move
  • Z - Jump, Float
  • X - Shoot
  • Down - Stop floating
  • Enter - Pause

(Controllers are supported too.)
